p: Large cluster strains also showed a lower barrier to resistance to dolutegravir with R263K ( n = 3) or S153Y ( n = 1) mutations appearing by week 8 in large cluster lineages; these mutations were absent in the four small cluster viruses at week 36 (Figure 4c). It was, however, noteworthy that the acquisition of R263K and S153Y had a negative impact on RT enzymatic activity, hindering escalations in dolutegravir concentrations beyond 5–10 nM (Figure 4c). Dual selections with dolutegravir and lamivudine showed the appearance of resistance in only one large cluster isolate (14947) with the first appearance of R263K at week 8 preceding the acquisition of M184I/V and M184V at weeks 15 and 23, respectively (Figure 4d). Drug concentrations of both drugs could not be increased following the acquisition of R263K.
